Description:
Improvement Notice 312401633 served as company have failed to ensure that exposure to substances hazardous to health is either prevented or where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.

Improvement Notice 312401906 served as company have failed to provide suitable and sufficient washing facilities for their employees as there is no hot water in the employee toilets.

Improvement Notice 312401934 served as company have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to the dangerous parts of their bank of Herbert pedestal drills (namely the rotating chuck and spindle), such as fitting a suitable chuck guard that encloses the chuck and spindle to the greatest extent practicable.

Prohibition Notice 312401974 served because company have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to or stop movement of the dangerous parts of the Brown bandsaw before a part of a person enters the danger zone.
